alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln; Logan; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 26 at 2:04PM CST until December 27 at 12:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and northwest winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow accumulations of up to one inch are possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central, southwest and west central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until midnight CST tonight. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cherry; Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln; Logan; Thomas
